alert.note: Alert for Chester; Delaware (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 4:13PM EST until January 10 at 8:24PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Brandywine Creek At Chadds Ford affecting Delaware and Chester Counties. For the Brandywine Creek...including Chadds Ford...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Brandywine Creek at Chadds Ford. * WHEN...From late tonight to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Open adjacent land next to the creek floods. At 10.0 feet, The intersections of Creek Road and Route 926 near Pocopson floods upstream of Chadds Ford. At 11.8 feet, Brandywine River Museum begins to take on water. Route 1 also takes on water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 3.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 10.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.9 feet on 12/25/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (7 pm) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Stg Time Date Brandywine Creek Chadds Ford 9.0 3.1 Tue 3 pm 6.7 4.1 10.8 7am 1/10 &&
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 415 AM EST.
